btrplace.solver.choco

Class DefaultReconfigurationProblem

  • java.lang.Object
    • btrplace.solver.choco.DefaultReconfigurationProblem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReconfigurationProblem

    public class DefaultReconfigurationProblem
extends Object
implements ReconfigurationProblem
    Default implementation of ReconfigurationProblem.
    Author:
    Fabien Hermenier

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_MAX_TIME
      The maximum duration of a plan in seconds: One hour.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DefaultReconfigurationProblem(Model m, ChocoReconfigurationAlgorithmParams ps, Set<VM> ready, Set<VM> running, Set<VM> sleeping, Set<VM> killed, Set<VM> preRooted)
      Make a new RP where the next state for every VM is indicated.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_MAX_TIME

        public static final int DEFAULT_MAX_TIME
        The maximum duration of a plan in seconds: One hour.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • DefaultReconfigurationProblem

        public DefaultReconfigurationProblem(Model m,
                                     ChocoReconfigurationAlgorithmParams ps,
                                     Set<VM> ready,
                                     Set<VM> running,
                                     Set<VM> sleeping,
                                     Set<VM> killed,
                                     Set<VM> preRooted)
                              throws SolverException
        Make a new RP where the next state for every VM is indicated. If the state for a VM is omitted, it is considered as unchanged
        Parameters:
        m - the initial model
        ps - parameters to customize the problem
        ready - the VMs that must be in the ready state
        running - the VMs that must be in the running state
        sleeping - the VMs that must be in the sleeping state
        killed - the VMs that must be killed
        preRooted - the VMs that can be managed by the solver when they are already running and they must keep running
        Throws:
        SolverException - if an error occurred
        See Also:
        to ease the instantiation process

    • Method Detail

      • solve

        public ReconfigurationPlan solve(int timeLimit,
                                 boolean optimize)
                          throws SolverException
        Description copied from interface: ReconfigurationProblem
        Solve the RP and return a solution if exists.
        Specified by:
        solve in interface ReconfigurationProblem
        Parameters:
        timeLimit - the timeout in second. Must be superior to 0 to be considered
        optimize - true to make the solver try to improve the first computed solution.
        Returns:
        a plan if the solving process succeeded, null if the solver was not able to compute a solution.
        Throws:
        SolverException - if an error occurs

        Returns:

        Description copied from interface: ReconfigurationProblem

        Specified by:

        Returns:

      • setObjective

        public void setObjective(boolean b,
                         solver.variables.IntVar v)
        Description copied from interface: ReconfigurationProblem
        Set the optimisation variable.
        Specified by:
        setObjective in interface ReconfigurationProblem
        Parameters:
        b - true to minimise the value. false to maximise it
        v - the variable to optimise
